エネミー HK_市民悪漢01-1
エネミー HK_市民悪漢01-1

parameters: Huh? Another chubby girl has come. \n< Thug >
Oh, who are you...wait, aren't you just a girl? Did
you get lost or something...hehe. \n< Thug >
I'm an adventurer. Are you the impudent fellow called
John? \n< Serena >
Hehehe, adventurer, adventurer. You've come from the
guild, haven't you? \n< Thug >
I'm the one called John...but those assassins, hired
by some fat girl with a grudge, underestimated me. \n< Street thugs John >
Name's John, but...Being attacked by a little shrimp
like you, I've been underestimated too. \n< Street thugs John >
Ah, it was actually cheap. The guild only set a price
of 200 S for you. It's the equivalent of two
milkings. \n< Serena >

Ha! Then I'll beat you up! I gotta let those guys know
that the price tag is wrong! \n< Street thugs John >
That's problematic. After all, it's a job where we
can earn 200S with the effort of 100S. I'll definitely
prevent any correction in the price. \n< Serena >
